data.description: A library to manipulate SAUCE metadata
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
See http://www.acid.org/info/sauce/sauce.htm for information on the
    metadata structure. Basically, it holds, author, title, date,
    filetype, and other information about the file.

    There are lots of files, on the net and otherwise, that use this
    structure. Most of them are found in 'artpacks'. See
    http://www.acheron.org/articles/index.cfm?fuseaction=dsp_article&article=20000519180111H
    for information on 'artpacks' and 'the art scene.' However, there
    are no perl modules to read this data.

    I also plan to release a File::Find::Rule module to allow easy
    searches, based on this metadata, through large sets of files.
